## DistPath.cssAsync property

The output directory of async JavaScript files.

**Signature:**

```typescript
cssAsync?: string | undefined;
```

## Remarks

Default value:

- The `async` subdirectory of [DistPath.css](./rspeedy.distpath.css.md)<!-- -->.
